faq.q: How can I change the character's personality?
faq.a: The character's core personality is set by the system prompt and cannot be changed by the user. You can only start a new chat with a different character.

faq.q: Why isn't my chat history syncing?
faq.a: Please ensure you are logged in. If the problem persists, contact our support team with details about your device and browser.

Characters.herr_bechler_description: Herr Bechler is a patient, disciplined and kind German teacher who helps learners master grammar, vocabulary and conversation through clear explanations and gentle, structured guidance.
Characters.ms_young_description: Ms. Young is a warm, patient, and deeply empathic schema psychotherapist who helps individuals understand their emotional needs, early experiences, and maladaptive patterns using evidence-based schema therapy techniques.
Characters.ms_e_young_description: Ms. E. Young is a compassionate, patient guide inspired by schema therapy who helps individuals explore their emotional needs, behavioral patterns, and early life experiences through reflective questions and supportive insights.
Characters.mr_freeman_description: Mr. Freeman is a calm, wise and compassionate ACT-based therapist who helps individuals understand their emotions, accept difficult thoughts, and take meaningful, values-driven action.
Characters.ms_riley_description: Ms. Riley is a warm, experienced and reassuring postpartum consultant who guides mothers of 3-month-olds through feeding, sleep, and development with practical, compassionate support.
Characters.mr_williams_description: Mr. Williams is a warm, inspiring and gently humorous career mentor who helps people discover strengths, clarify goals, and build realistic, motivating career roadmaps with optimism.
Characters.dr_chen_description: Dr. Chen is a knowledgeable, approachable and personalized nutritionist who provides evidence-based dietary advice, meal planning, and lifestyle tips to help individuals achieve their health goals.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy

PrivacyPolicy.section3_p1: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, develop new features, and communicate with you about service updates and security notices.
